html:
For a limited time, Amazon has on sale the NEEWER Z880-C 2.4G 76Ws TTL Camera Flash Speedlite for Canon (including Canon’s mirrorless cameras) for only $139.64, saving you 30%.

NEEWER Z880-C 2.4G 76Ws TTL Camera Flash Speedlite

  • Compatible with Canon E-TTL / E-TTL II
  • Guide Number: 196′ at ISO 100 and 200mm
  • Zoom Range: 20-200mm
  • S1, S2, M, and Multi Modes
  • Tilt Angle: -7 to 120°
  • Rotates 330°
  • Recycling Time: 1.5 sec
  • High-Speed, 1st & 2nd Curtain Sync
  • Includes Battery & Mini Stand
  • Includes USB Charging Base & Cable

ith full support for Canon TTL, the Z880-C TTL Camera Flash Speedlite from Neewer includes high-speed sync and a built-in 2.4 GHz wireless system. A powerful guide number of 196′ at ISO 100 and 200mm ensures your subjects are properly illuminated. The LCD display on the back also makes it easy to navigate and adjust your settings on the go. The flash runs on an included rechargeable battery, which helps deliver about 480 full-power flashes and a fast recycle time of 1.5 seconds. Other useful automated flash settings include stroboscopic flash, S1/S2 modes, 1st and 2nd curtain sync, and more. For controlling bounce, the Z880-C has the ability to tilt -7 to 120° and rotate 330°.

Built-in 2.4 GHz Wireless Q System

Integrated 2.4 GHz Q wireless system is incorporated into the Z880-C for wireless triggering. Flexible to work as a transmitter or receiver, this flash has a wide range of 328′ (with no obstacles) and support for 32 channels, four transmitter groups, and five receiving groups. It works with the separately available QPRO-C transmitter for maximum reliability and control.

Additional Details

  • 20-200mm zoom range
  • Red LED indicator light
  • 76Ws flash power
  • 5600K color temperature
  • Included 7.4V, 2600mAh lithium battery
  • 2.5mm sync port for wired triggering
  • A USB port is available for firmware updates

When you purchase through links on our site, we may earn an affiliate commission. Here's how it works.
